doc.previous: In Sardinia there are also another type of pre historic burial chambers called Domus de Janas Sardinian House of the Fairies or of the Witches During the Bronze Age the Nuragic civilization built circa 3000 Giants grave a type of megalithic gallery grave that can be found throughout Sardinia with different structures
doc.after: Dolmen are also in Apulia and in Sicily In this latter region they are small structures located in Mura Pregne Palermo Sciacca Agrigento Monte Bubbonia Caltanissetta Butera Caltanissetta Cava Lazzaro Siracusa Cava dei Servi Ragusa Avola Siracusa Dating to the early Bronze Age 2200 1800 BC the prehistoric Sicilian buildings were covered by a circular mound of earth In the dolmen of Cava dei Servi the archaeologists found numerous human bone fragments and some splinters of Castelluccian ceramics Early Bronze Age which confirmed the burial purpose of the artefact 11
